categories: Category:Imperial Navy officers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Silverline was a Human male ace TIE pilot who served as a captain in the Galactic Empire's Imperial Navy during the time of the Galactic Civil War. He piloted a TIE Oppressor.

Silverline appeared aboard his starship in Jump to Lightspeed, the 2004 expansion pack for the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
